PHRASE.LANG: Look like Betty Spence, owner and barmaid of the Cloak & Dagger public house, the only one of its kind in Little Riddle. No, she is, yes, no. Yes she is, no. [#Legal]
Ressemble fort à Betty Spence, propriétaire et serveuse du bar "De cape et d'épée". Unique en son genre à Little Riddle. Ah non ! Enfin si ! Non. [#Legal]
Sieh aus wie Betty Spence, die Besitzerin und Bardame der Keipe Cloak & Dagger, die einzige ihrer Art in Little Riddle. Nein, sie ist, ja, nein. Ja, sie ist, nein. [#Legal]
Assumi l’aspetto di Betty Spence, gerente del Cloack & Dagger, l’unico del suo tipo a Little Ridde. No, lei, sì, no… Sì, lei, no. [#Legal]
Siéntete como Betty Spence, la dueña y camarera del bar Cloak & Dagger, no hay otra como ella en Little Riddle. ¿La hay? ¿No la hay? [#Legal]
Look like Betty Spence, owner and barmaid of the Cloak & Dagger public house, the only one of its kind in Little Riddle. No, she is, yes, no. Yes she is, no. [#Legal]
